content: I’ve always seen myself as an introverted extrovert. I see myself as an extrovert because I love talking people and sharing experiences however I friendly fear the social rejection and humiliation. This causes me to not wanna push myself out of my introverted shell and even though I love my introverted side I feel like deep inside I am truly an extrovert, or is that just the social side of my introvertedness. I don’t know anymore
